captions.text:
I got to catch
a plane.

Two hours of staring
at material

to decide to reconvene
after the holidays.

They're selling cosmetics,
not curing cancer.

title: Planes, Trains & Automobiles (2/10) Movie CLIP - Owen (1987) HD

comments.author: o kap mein kap

comments.text:
That Owen is Dylan Baker.  Just now realized that.  All these years i 
thought it was just some redneck they pulled from the backwoods.  But it's 
really an accomplished actor who is no where near that character.  Good job 
Mr. Baker!﻿
comments.author: unhombrelobo

comments.text:
Yeah I couldn't believe it was him either.  He usually plays serious, clean 
cut intellectuals (Spiderman & Thirteen Days).  But he really nails this 
role & it has got to be one of the funniest scenes ever.
